title: Baby I'm READY To GO!
body_text:
GOLDrush!
The results have been tallied and only those select few will be walking out of this 120th extravaganza with a prized
Gold Award
.
2007
RIVALRY of the Year
Chris Adams vs. Kevin Fitzpatrick - Juan Londono vs. Tom Adams - Kevin Megill vs. Mike Edwards - Sascha Basista vs. Ray Marzarella - WALL vs. ALL
2007
New CONCEPT of the Year
PickYourPoison Rules
-
BoxBall Dodgeball
-
CREAMation Rules
- The
Dodgeball Draft
2007
ROOKIE of the Year
Sascha Basista - Michael Butler - Grant Cornero - Juan Londono - Rob Pellecchia - Justin Wolf
2007
PLAYER of the Year
Mike Edwards - Lauren Stopa - Kevin Adams - Ryan Letsche
Congratulations to the nominees and good luck at DODGEBALL CXX!
The MAIN EVENT!
You can just feel the electricity and raw emotion brewing for this one! A match for the ages when
Ryan Letsche
collides with
Grant Cornero
at the kick-off event of 2008! Who better to headline this milestone spectacle than perhaps the two most dominant forces of the past 365 days!
LETSCHE
The wealth of experience especially in the big time scene may give the "Rimshot King" a distinct advantage heading into DODGEBALL CXX. Letsche has fought and beaten the best, en route to becoming one of the most recognized names in the colorful history of the game. His catching alone could not be mirrored over the course of the past 12 months.
CORNERO
His undying drive in the infamous
WALL vs. ALL
wars and heated meetings with the legendary Kevin Adams propelled this athletically-blessed
ROOKIE of the Year
contender to the top of the ranks. Look for Cornero to mercilessly unleash that cannon right arm he is oh-so well known for.
It does not and will not get much sweeter than this. Two deserving individuals in the most crucial encounter of their careers and only one will stand tall when the smoke clears.
Ryan Letsche vs. Grant Cornero
at the once-in-a-lifetime spectacle, DODGEBALL CXX. Catch the inaugural 2008 blockbuster beginning at 6pm!
What Else?
Wild decorations? Glowing lights? A 50/50 raffle? Damn! And who could possibly forget about the hip-hoppin' soundtrack to go with it, jump-started by Republica's "Ready to Go" - the official theme of DODGEBALL CXX!
And We're Not Done Yet!
Join the warriors of
EastCoastDodgeball
for the official afterparty at the popular Pete and Elda's Bar and Pizzeria in Neptune! An event of this magnitude just can't end on the court - come on out and celebrate! 10:45pm!
body_html:
GOLDrush!
The results have been tallied and only those select few will be walking out of this 120th extravaganza with a prized Gold Award.

2007 RIVALRY of the Year
Chris Adams vs. Kevin Fitzpatrick - Juan Londono vs. Tom Adams - Kevin Megill vs. Mike Edwards - Sascha Basista vs. Ray Marzarella - WALL vs. ALL

2007 New CONCEPT of the Year
PickYourPoison Rules - BoxBall Dodgeball - CREAMation Rules - The Dodgeball Draft

2007 ROOKIE of the Year
Sascha Basista - Michael Butler - Grant Cornero - Juan Londono - Rob Pellecchia - Justin Wolf

2007 PLAYER of the Year
Mike Edwards - Lauren Stopa - Kevin Adams - Ryan Letsche

Congratulations to the nominees and good luck at DODGEBALL CXX!

The MAIN EVENT!
You can just feel the electricity and raw emotion brewing for this one! A match for the ages when Ryan Letsche collides with Grant Cornero at the kick-off event of 2008! Who better to headline this milestone spectacle than perhaps the two most dominant forces of the past 365 days!

LETSCHE
The wealth of experience especially in the big time scene may give the "Rimshot King" a distinct advantage heading into DODGEBALL CXX. Letsche has fought and beaten the best, en route to becoming one of the most recognized names in the colorful history of the game. His catching alone could not be mirrored over the course of the past 12 months.

CORNERO
His undying drive in the infamous WALL vs. ALL wars and heated meetings with the legendary Kevin Adams propelled this athletically-blessed ROOKIE of the Year contender to the top of the ranks. Look for Cornero to mercilessly unleash that cannon right arm he is oh-so well known for.

It does not and will not get much sweeter than this. Two deserving individuals in the most crucial encounter of their careers and only one will stand tall when the smoke clears. Ryan Letsche vs. Grant Cornero at the once-in-a-lifetime spectacle, DODGEBALL CXX. Catch the inaugural 2008 blockbuster beginning at 6pm!

What Else?
Wild decorations? Glowing lights? A 50/50 raffle? Damn! And who could possibly forget about the hip-hoppin' soundtrack to go with it, jump-started by Republica's "Ready to Go" - the official theme of DODGEBALL CXX!
And We're Not Done Yet!
Join the warriors of EastCoastDodgeball for the official afterparty at the popular Pete and Elda's Bar and Pizzeria in Neptune! An event of this magnitude just can't end on the court - come on out and celebrate! 10:45pm!
